articles.author: John Sarkar
articles.title: Edible oil cos set to slash prices
articles.description: In a major relief to consumers suffering from high inflation, edible oil companies in India are set to slash prices following a readjustment of global supply chains and relaxation of export curbs in markets such as Indonesia.
